alert.note: Alert for Barton; Dade; Jasper; Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 10:33AM CDT until May 15 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BARTON...NORTHWESTERN LAWRENCE...JASPER AND DADE COUNTIES... At 1033 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Greenfield to 6 miles southwest of Golden City to 7 miles northwest of Purcell, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carthage... Oronogo... Carterville... Duquesne... Greenfield... Sarcoxie... Duenweg... Lockwood... Jasper... Golden City... Miller... Alba... Purcell... Everton... Carytown... Fidelity... Stotts City... Neck City... Avilla... La Russell... This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 11 and 38. Interstate 49 between mile markers 36 and 59. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
